author: A_Brickset_user
title: DUMB!
review:
This is not a game. This is just dumb. Richard the Strong is annoying, as he won't SHUT UP! Cedric he Bull doesn't even attack the castle! The things just walk around. Blowing the stuff up is fun, though.

Pros:

Good intro video.
Blowing stuff up is fun.

Cons: 

No point
Richard won't shut up
The Queen's voice sounds like a man's voice.

author: A_Brickset_user
title: Terrible
review:
This game is terrible! How can anyone create such a stupid game?
1: Too difficult for small kids and boring for grownups.
2: Stupid controls.
3: Ugly details.
4: Too few bricks.
5: Too few quests.
I don't know why I bought this silly game...

author: NickBrick
title: Why does"nt Lego make more games like this
review:
I have 4 Lego games but this is my favorite building Lego game.
The graphics need work but the little cut-scenes make up for that. They are so funny.
Plus this has tons of sets in it. Not all the knight kingdom sets but it has some combo models.
the voices are good too

                                            pros.
                              Cool soundtrack
                              fun
                              you can build huge kingdoms
                              you can fire cannons and catapults and crossbows
                              cut-scenes

                                             Cons.
                         Sir richard takes a long time to teach you the way too play the game
